entry.title: Jewelry Mold Reuseable Easy Cast 22 Cavities #33610
entry.summary:
Vendor: Environmental Technology
Type: Jewelry Mold
Price: 3.65

Easy Cast Jewelry Mold

11 popular jewelry shapes on one

convenient reuseable tray with 22 cavities.

For use with  Easy Cast Clear Casting Epoxy or Castin' Craft Polyester Resin.  All molds require mold release when casting with EasyCast Clear Casting Epoxy or Castin' Craft Clear Polyester Casting Resin

9 popular jewelry shapes on one convenient

The picture below contains samples of items that can be made with this mold.  These samples are not included with the purchase of the mold.

entry.title: Easy Cast Clear Casting Epoxy 2 Gallon Case #33128C
entry.summary:
Vendor: Environmental Technology
Type: Epoxy Resin
Price: 138.30

 Easy Cast Clear Casting Epoxy,   Case of 2 gallons

Case  Contains:  1 gallon resin, 1 gallon hardener.   (2-1/2 gallons Resin, 2-1/2 gallon hardener)

Easy Cast Clear Casting Resin is a two component, low odor, solvent free, clear casting epoxy. It's ideal for casting small decorative items such as kitchen and bathroom knobs. Color EasyCast with Castin'Craft opaque pigments for solid colors, transparent dyes for that colored glass look or granite powders for the look of stone. Mix and pour EasyCast into any of the Castin'Craft knob and pull molds to create your own decorative knob and pulls.  This product contains a UV Inhibitor to retard yellowing.  This kit contains one 64 ounce bottle of resin and one 64 ounce bottle of hardener, for a total of one gallon.

FOR AIR SHIPMENTS,  this product is considered Hazardous.  Additional HazMat Fees Apply.  See Terms and Conditions.

Instructions for use Click Here:

Safety Data Sheet:  Hardener            Safety Data Sheet:  Resin

entry.summary:
Vendor: Environmental Technology
Type: Epoxy Resin
Price: 24.20

 EasyCast Clear Casting Epoxy, #33032

32 ounce kit

Kit Contains:  16 ounces of resin, 16 ounce of hardener.

Please choose UPS ground or USPS retail ground only for this product.  See our terms and conditions for aerosols and ORM-D products.  This product is unable to ship priority mail or first class mail.

EasyCast Clear Casting Resin is a two component, low odor, solvent free, clear casting epoxy. It's ideal for casting small decorative items such as kitchen and bathroom knobs. Color EasyCast with Castin' Craft opaque pigments for solid colors, transparent dyes for that colored glass look or granite powders for the look of stone. Mix and pour EasyCast into any of the Castin' Craft knob and pull molds to create your own decorative knob and pulls.  This product contains a UV Inhibitor to retard yellowing.  This kit contains one 64 ounce bottle of resin and one 64 ounce bottle of hardener, for a total of one gallon.
